description:
NOT OFFERED IN 2011.The dissertation will be a 10,000 word document and will consist of a typical thesis in psychology (i.e., introduction, method, results, discussion). Each student's topic must be approved by the program director and should be field-based. 
Students commencing in semester 1 enrol in PSYC7800 for two semesters. Students commencing in semester 2 enrol in PSYC7990 for two semesters.
